course.subject: MATH
course.name: Topics in Life Contingency
course.description: This course provides an overview of the application of life contingency models to life insurance and defined benefit pension valuations. Together with MATH 4513, it covers the syllabus of the Society of Actuaries MLC Exam. Topics include: policy values and reserves; multiple lives models; multiple decrement models; discrete and continuous time Markov chains; pension mathematics; emerging costs for traditional and Universal life insurance; participating life insurance.
course.prerequisites: MATH 2411 AND MATH 2421 AND MATH 2511
